Hi,

I want to unit-test my database application, but am a bit confused
aft=
er reading Massol's 'JUnit in Action' and Rainsberger's 'JUnit
Recipes'.  G=
ranted these books were published in 2004 and 2005
respectively, so may be =
a bit outdated.

JUnit in Action uses DynaMock for its database testing exa=
mples in
Chapter 11.  Does DynaMock still exist or is JMock the new version=
 of
it?  But JMock doesn't contain any specific SQL classes, like
MockConne=
ction, or?

EasyMock doesn't seem to have any SQL specific classes either.
=

So what's the latest recommendation of a mock object implementation
when t=
esting database applications?

Thanks,
Deirdre
